title: Component Adoption Workflow
description: Integration with app-issue-tracker for generating detailed adoption reports and tracking

requirements.title: Apply to Scenario Workflow
requirements.description: Generate detailed adoption reports via app-issue-tracker with absolute paths, dependencies, and step-by-step integration instructions
notes: Prompt for target scenario and destination path

requirements.title: Adoption Tracking Records
requirements.description: Track which scenarios have adopted which components, at which version, with timestamps
notes: Store adoption records: libraryId, scenario, file path, version, timestamp
Create record when adoption issue is marked complete
Query adoption status by component or scenario

requirements.title: Automated Adoption Verification
requirements.description: Confirm adopted files exist and validate header comments during adoption tracking
notes: Verify adopted file exists at target path
Validate header comment is present and correct
Update adoption status based on verification

requirements.title: Adoption Status Dashboard
requirements.description: Show which scenarios use which components, their versions, and update status (current/behind/modified)
notes: Dashboard view: components and their adoptions
Status indicators: up-to-date, behind, locally modified
